name: English
welcometext:
Welcome on %sitename% support,
order to contact support, please login or register !
javascriptAlert: Javascript is disabled in your browser, please set the order to send the completed forms and actions on our site. Reasonable, will be displayed.
IDNotNumeric: ID of ticket as not numeric
youCantViewThisTicket: You can not see this ticket!
noTicketOnFAQ: There are no tickets in the FAQ!
errorJohnDoe: An error of unknown type was detected!
sessionError: You have been disconnected, the username of your session does not match its id, please reconnect with your email address!
youreConnected: You are connected ! The page will refresh!
subject: Subject
permCom: Error, you do not have permission to comment!
yourNotAutor: You are not the author of the ticket!
youCantResolve: you can not solve the tickets!
authSuccess: Authentication approved! The page will refresh!
MailJohnDoe: No account is opened with email address!
welcomeTextMail1:
. Hello and welcome to %sitename% support 
 here is your access code so you can see a list of your ticket:
welcomeTextMail2:
Keep it carefully you will contact no further!
 Sincerely %sitename% team
welcomeHTMLMail1:
Hello and welcome to %sitename% support
here is your access code so you can see a list of your ticket:
welcomeHTMLMail2:
Keep it carefully you will contact no further!
Sincerely %sitename% team
sendSuccess: Your ticket has been sent! An administrator will answer them as soon as possible! To see your ticket, use your access code, if you do not have one, look in your mailbox (please see if the code is in the spam).
sendSuccess2: Your ticket has been sent! An administrator will answer them as soon as possible! You will be redirected to the list of your tickets!
permSendTicket: You do not have the permissions to send a ticket!
emptyField: One of the fields is not filled in!
signinSuccess: You are registered and logged on %sitename%! The page will refresh!
noPassIdentique: Both of your password are not identical!
alreadyExists: An account already exists with this nickname or this email address!
disconnectSuccess: You've logged out ! The page will refresh!
ticketNotAssigned: This ticket is not yet assigned
